main.java.model

Class DiagonalMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.model.Matrix
      • main.java.model.DiagonalMatrix

  • public class DiagonalMatrix
extends Matrix
    Matrix subclass that handles specialised methods for diagonal matrices.
    Author:
    Isaac Jordan

    • Constructor Detail

      • DiagonalMatrix

        public DiagonalMatrix(java.lang.String name,
                      double[] values,
                      java.time.LocalDate date)
        Creates a diagonal matrix with the values given along the main diagonal.
        Parameters:
        name -
        values - An array of values to put on the main diagonal. The length of this determines how many rows the diagonal matrix will have.
        date - Set creation date to this date. Can be null for today.
